mapper.select: select * from item_category where isDel = 'N' order by rootNum asc , seq asc
mapper.insert: insert into item_category(idx, categoryName, rootNum, step, division, seq, isDel) values(category_idx.nextval, #{categoryName},category_idx.currval,0,#{division},0 ,'N')
insert into item_category(idx, categoryName, rootNum, step, division, seq, isDel) values(category_idx.nextval, #{categoryName}, #{rootNum },#{step },#{division},#{seq } ,'N')
mapper.update: update item_category set seq = seq+1 where rootNum=#{rootNum} and seq >= #{seq}
update item_category set isDel='Y' where idx = #{idx}
update item_category set categoryName = #{categoryName}, division = #{division } where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: select * from item_category where categoryName like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
